archiefmat.titel: Gerechtsrol, resoluties en sententies van directeur en raden; ingekomen rekesten met daarop genomen beschikkingen; processtukken en bijlagen
archiefmat.titel_eng: Cause-list, resolutions and sentences of Director and Councillors; received petitions and related decrees; judicial papers and appendices
archiefmat.notes: For the period January-June 1769 see no. 40; these inventory items were shipped from Cura çao to the Netherlands at a later date (1924) than the bulk of this archive. Consequently, these documents were described in a supplement to the inventory.
